extensionDescription.message: WebExtension that allows you to create your own custom theme based on the color of site's favicon, the background color of a page, or any other color you choose.

help2Intro.message: It all started with a simple extension called Favicon Color, but over time, it has evolved into something much more. Now, it's a full-fledged theme creator that allows you to use the color of website's favicon and page, as well as your own colors and apply them to almost any part of the browser.

help3Description.message:
The settings consist of global options and options for specific parts of the browser. You see a schematic image of the browser in front of you.

To turn on or off the coloring of a specific part of the browser, just click on it with the left mouse button.

Right-clicking opens the context menu for the selected part of the browser, as well as the connected with it.

By clicking on the context menu header, you can select the connected part of the browser and configure it by changing inheritance or other options.

help4Conclusion.message: Good luck in creating a unique theme.

warning.message: The current theme is not compatible with this extension. We recommend installing a different theme than the system default.
